title: Stuart Sandler turns 1 year older ... yesterday!
content:
I hope your birthday was really really really sweet.  
Even if a day late I hope this is still a treat!

 [‹ Anatomy of the lowercase I and J](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629153129/http:/typophile.com/node/19126 "Go to previous forum topic") [Who is going to FontTech Weekend and where to stay? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629153129/http:/typophile.com/node/19112 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Congrats Stuart! Hope your staff at the Diner cooked up a special treat on your special day.

It always feels good to know that the young(ish) guys are getting older too :-)  
Congrats Stuart!

Happy Birthday, Stuart.  
_( Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy. :)_

Dav

_( Addendum: By the way, one of my excuses for the delay would be that I couldnt access Typophile for the last day or so, but maybe that was just me. :)_

okay, so it’s a bit late, but...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629153129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/birfdaystu2006.gif)

Hmmm, notice that sweet new script Paul is flashing! That is a real Zaner Paul! Good work.

Oh, and HAPPY BIRTHDAY Stuart!

:-)

ChrisL
where is the birthday boy anyway? maybe he’s out celebrating? \>^P
maybe he’s still passed out drunk from partying all night. d:

Thanks for the kind words all!

Let’s just say to celebrate the specific occasion I enjoyed a coupla Rolling Rock beers which bear the year of this celebration in my life :D

We had a great day at the Dells in Wisconsin, kinda like what the Ozarks are to Missouri :D

Anyhow, thanks to all for helping make this a great celebration for me! Sincerely . . . Since most of my work is done in my studio with little physical human interaction, my virtual friends at Typophile become my closest co-workers!

Warmly,  
Stuart :D
Happy birthday, Stuart! I hope you enjoyed the Dells. It’s not necessarily an easy thing to enjoy, although I’m sure you would appreciate the kitsch quotient.

Instead of Happy Birthday, does anybody else on the board get sung the Alphabet song on their birthday?

”. . . Next time wont you sing with me!”

:D
